messages.subject: Re: Upset, need some support
messages.msgSnippet: LOL. I guess many attachment parenting folk are fine with it as long as it s short-lived.  If they only understood how great it could be to continue with
messages.messageBody:
LOL. I guess many attachment parenting folk are fine with it as long
as it's short-lived. If they only understood how great it could be to
continue with attachment parenting on into "school age." :) That's
kinda the idea, I think. Continuing the connection on up in years.

Kathe

wrote:

someone

brief

> didn't even know it." Of course it was explained that all this
continues

messages.subject: RE:  Upset, need some support
messages.msgSnippet: Wow, Alyssa, I can t believe that.  I m just sitting her shocked. Especially when the kids are still so young. ((((HUGS!!!))) It s funny how different people
messages.messageBody:
Wow, Alyssa, I can't believe that. I'm just sitting her shocked. Especially
when the kids are still so young.
((((HUGS!!!)))

It's funny how different people react. Recently on our API board someone
mentioned unschooling, and someone else asked what it was. After a brief
explanation, several people responded back, "Wow I'm an unschooler and
didn't even know it." Of course it was explained that all this continues
into the school age as well. No response after that.

misty
